name: ColtsFan
0:
”Alexa, open Colts fan.”
”Alexa, ask Colts fan for a flash briefing on the Colts.”
”Alexa, ask Colts fan about the previous game score.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: colts fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Colts by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Colts.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Colts Fan how are the Colts doing? 

Alexa, ask Colts Fan who do the Colts play next?

Alexa, ask Colts Fan Andrew Luck (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Colts:


Alexa, ask Colts Fan to tell me some trivia about the Colts. 

Alexa, ask Colts Fan how many Super Bowls have the Colts won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
